snippet: Officials from the National Aeronautics and Space Administration were unable to catch a cab on Wednesday when they tried to leave the new space shuttle exhibit at the Intrepid Sea, Air & Space Museum.
abstract: Officials from the National Aeronautics and Space Administration were unable to catch a cab on Wednesday when they tried to leave the new space shuttle exhibit at the Intrepid Sea, Air & Space Museum.

headline.main: In the Rain, Stewards of the Enterprise Can Keep it Dry, but Can't Catch a Cab
